rows.label: qst201812_msg0001
rows.name: Um, hello?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0003
rows.name:
...This is a souvenir. Would you
like to share it with everyone?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0005
rows.name: Maybe you don't like it, mo?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0006
rows.name: They might just be very cautious.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0007
rows.name:
Don't you want to eat
it? It looks delicious.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0009
rows.name: Uka will eat it all, you know?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0011
rows.name: Wait, wait! Don't eat it!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0012
rows.name:
Hahaha! Are you finally
willing to talk?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0013
rows.name: ...Mmm, it was truly delicious.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0014
rows.name:
Now, what ulterior motive do you
have for giving us such a gift?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0015
rows.name:
Actually, I'm looking
for a certain Phonex...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0016
rows.name:
...Looking for a Phonex?
Could it be about Pepe?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0017
rows.name: You know him?!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0018
rows.name:
Yes. It's rare for someone to come all
the way from another country. He is a
man worthy of being called a hero.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0019
rows.name: Where is Pepe-san now?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0020
rows.name: ...Unfortunately, he is no longer here.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0021
rows.name:
What?! He's not here? Did he
go to another country again?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0022
rows.name: No, it's not like that.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0023
rows.name:
He gathered the young ones
around here and was talking
to them about something...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0024
rows.name:
...and then they were attacked
by a Vacillus Antol and
everyone was captured.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0025
rows.name: What?! Why didn't you go save them!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0026
rows.name:
Even if we tried, the opponent
is a powerful monster.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0027
rows.name:
Even the hero Pepe was
helpless against it. We
wouldn't stand a chance.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0028
rows.name:
They've probably already become food
for the Vacillus Antol by now...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0029
rows.name: We have no choice but to give up.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0030
rows.name: No!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0032
rows.name: You must not lose hope!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0033
rows.name:
We might still be in time!
We won't know until we go!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0034
rows.name:
Please tell me where
the Vacillus Antol is!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0035
rows.name:
The Vacillus Antol went towards
the Ruined Chapel of Danafas...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0036
rows.name: Its nest is probably there...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0037
rows.name: Understood!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0038
rows.name:
Don't worry. I, Uka, will
surely rescue everyone!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0039
rows.name:
Everyone, please lend me your strength!
Operation Rescue Pepe begins!
